description: Contains identifying information for entities (persons or organizations) from an electronic remittance payment. This information is sent in the NM1 segment of an ANSI 835 Health Care Claim Payment/Advice file. This information is stored in the remittance image record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: ID for the remittance image record containing the claim related entity information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ID_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The entity identifier code for the claim related entity. This is a standard code that indicates what type of individual or organization is being identified.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Insured or subscriber


Corrected insured


Rendering provider


Transfer to


Payer


Other Insured

columns.name: ENT_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code indicating whether this information is for a person or a non-person entity.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Person


Non-Person entity

columns.name: LAST_NAME_ORG_NAME
columns.description: This is the individual last name or organization name.

columns.name: MIDDLE_NAME
columns.description: The individual middle name or initial.

columns.name: IDEN_CODE_QUALF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The identification code qualifier. This is a standard code that indicates what type of ID is used to identify the specific individual or organization.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Social security number


Health insurance claim number


United states national individual identifer


Member identification number


Medicaid recipient identification number


Insured's changed unique identification number


Blue cross provider number


Blue shield provider number


Federal taxpayer's identification number


Medicaid provider number


Provider commercial number


State license number


Unique physician identification number


Health care financing administration national provider identifier


Blue cross blue shield association plan code


National association of insurance commissioners (NAIC) identification


Payor Identification


Pharmacy processor number


Health care financing administration national planID

columns.name: IDEN_CODE
columns.description: The ID associated with the specific individual or organization.
